S.FORM: bakici sapidadum ita ku bakici. siwkay nu bakici u bakici sa, sapilacul tu nanum saca tuutuud. u kamu nu Sakizaya "bakici", namakay Amilika a kamu "bucket". matenes misaungay nu tademaw. anu miculu' ku canacanan ,bakici sa u kapahay a sakaluk. itawya i niyazu', inayi' henay ku cilaisui sapidadum ku nayazu'ay. tinaku a kamu sibakici sibakici kaku midadum. sibakiciay ciniza dada' ku sibakiciay. u sulit nu Hulam atu Amilika . . , , , . A bucket or pail is typically a watertight, vertical cylinder or truncated cone, with an open top and a flat bottom, attached to a semicircular carrying handle called the bail. namakayniay a nasulitan nasakamuan atu natinengan
